o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_UninitializeExportExtension
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(objModel) WriteDebug "MDDE LDM Export extension un-initializion started"
' Clear the export attribute on the model. objModel.setExtendedAttribute "mddex_Model_Export_Template", Empty objModel.setExtendedAttribute cMDDE_NAMEDOBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_EXPORT_ATTRIBUTE_NAME, Empty
' Clear export attributes in packages recursively, where the model is the root package clearExportAttributesInPackage objModel, objModel
' Set initialization indicator to False objModel.SetExtendedAttribute cMDDE_EXPORT_EXTENSION_INITIALIZATION_INDICATOR, False
WriteDebug "MDDE LDM Export extension un-initializion finished" End Sub
Sub clearExportAttributesInPackage(objModel, objPackage) 'Loop over Entities clearExportAttributesOnCollection objModel, objPackage.Entities, "mddex_Entity_Export_Content", True
'Loop over Entity Attributes clearExportAttributesOnCollection objModel, objPackage.EntityAttributes, "mddex_EntityAttribute_Export_Content", True
'Loop over Mappings clearExportAttributesOnCollection objModel, objPackage.Mappings, "mddex_BaseClassifierMapping_Export_Content", True
'Loop over AttributeMappings clearExportAttributesOnCollection objModel, objPackage.ModelEntityAttributeMappings, "mddex_BaseStructuralFeatureMapping_Export_Content", False
' Loop over packages and clear them recursively. Dim childPackage For Each childPackage in objPackage.Packages clearExportAttributesInPackage objModel, childPackage Next End Sub
Sub clearExportAttributesOnCollection(objModel, objCollection, extendedAttributeName, applyNamedObjectTemplate) ' Loop over collection and set the extended attribute based on the export template Dim obj For Each obj in objCollection ' Skip shortcuts. If Not obj.IsShortCut Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute extendedAttributeName, Empty ' If specified, also clear the namedobject variable. If applyNamedObjectTemplate Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute cMDDE_NAMEDOBJECT_ATTRIBUTE_EXPORT_ATTRIBUTE_NAME, Empty End If End If Next End Sub
